alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 29 at 4:44PM MDT until July 29 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northern Utah, including the following county, Salt Lake. * WHEN...Until 645 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Water and debris over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 442 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - The Lisa Falls Area in Little Cottonwood Canyon is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Little Cottonwood Canyon, Alta and Snowbird.
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
